thread.section_title: Hotel Elysee Gare de Lyon - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean and friendly hotel
thread.title_full: Clean and friendly hotel - Review of Hotel Elysee Gare de Lyon, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: wendy743
title: Clean and friendly hotel
text: We are staying here for a couple of nights. We arrived early so room wasn't ready but we were able to leave our luggage and go out to explore. Our quad room is lovely with a big king bed and two singles and very clean. Beds are comfy and bathroom compact but not lacking in anything. Great location close to Gare de Lyon with lots of food options but doesn't seem touristy. Would stay again.
